info.title: Laravel Restful API
info.description: This API was concepted during classes of the course 'RESTful API with Laravel: Build a Real API with Laravel' that I took from the Udemy platform.

scopes.purchase-product: Create a new transaction for a specific product.
scopes.manage-products: Create, read, update and delete products (CRUD).
scopes.manage-account: Read your account data (except password) and modify it. Cannot delete.
scopes.read-general:
Read General information like purchasing categories, purchased products,
                                    selling products, selling categories, your transactions (purchases ans sales).
